title: Afghan Female Musicians Evacuated to Qatar After Prior U.S.-Led Effort Fell Short
sub_head: The departure was facilitated by Qatar and supported by backers including a Louisiana senator and Yo-Yo Ma
body:
LONDON—Members of an internationally renowned orchestra of Afghan women and girls have been evacuated from Afghanistan after protracted negotiations among the musicians’ supporters in the U.S., the Qatari government and Taliban leaders in Kabul.
The flight came more than a month after a U.S.-led attempt to get the musicians out in the last days of the war came to a halt at a Taliban checkpoint 100 yards from the gate of Kabul’s international airport.
